None.Name: Ensnare
None.Description: Covers an area of 15m radius in roots that fetter enemies to the ground. Rooted units are immobile but still able to use ranged attacks and special abilities. Affects ground targets only. Lasts for 15 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
